text:
I've filed 3 times trying to get unemployment insurance. I first filed thru the original website a month ago, tried to call, no answer. filed again 2 weeks with the next system and they called me to confirm info, still no results. 3rd time was today, another updated system, submission confirmed, waiting for a call.

I find there are 2 different websites. 
https://applications.labor.ny.gov/Individual/
https://unemployment.labor.ny.gov

Whats going on?
title: Double Unemployment websites.
